item.description:
Survey says....you want to find ways to reduce your environmental impact today! So....

Please join us to hear a presentation from Rob Taisey of Assured Solar Energy of North Yarmouth. Rob will talk to us about some very specific and practical ways to incorporate energy from the sun into our existing homes. He will also describe some specific products (like hot air solar collectors), compare performance, cost and greenhouse gas reduction vs. other solar technologies.

As usual, we'll start with a potluck at 6:30pm and presentation with Q&A to start around 7:15pm

We're trying NEW Potluck Breakdown:
Last Name Starting with A-R: "Heavy" appetizer or snack (i.e. not chips:)
Last Name Starting with S-Z: Beverage or desert
This will be a trial to see if "grazing" alot of appetizer-type foods might be easier than putting the burden on some to create a main dish or side dish. We'll see how it goes and revert back if we like the old way better!

Don't forget to bring your own potluck kit (dish/bowl/utensils/napkin/cup)!

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: April Meetup: Practical Solar Solutions for your Existing Home
